PathOfBuilding.Notes: It's important to check CDR of Holy Relic and place your beam frequence just under that with the hit rate. If you don't have access to ^xAF6025^xAF6025Ashes of the Stars ^xC8C8C8you'll most likely be better of using ^x70FF70Cyclone ^xC8C8C8to trigger your Holy Relics damage output till you have the amulet. Gwennen String: "nt ro|at c|vy b|r be|n j|amp|sim"
